result.title: Handbook on the impacts of bio-based and biodegradable plastics (and additives) on existing waste management frameworks
result.description: Analysis of technologies which are applied in the existing waste management practices and their interrelations impacts with endoflife routes of biobased and biodegradable plastics including the additives will be performed including assessment of possibilities to apply principles of circular economy to waste management on political and technical levels starting from city level with possibilities to scaleup in the urban environment The most promising business cases will be identified and viable business models including appropriate financing concepts will be presented with assessment of the integrated impacts of these technologies for upscaling purposes
